step_data.thought: I can see I'm currently on the Tax Rules page within the Stores section, and I've clicked on the 'STORES' link which has opened the Stores menu. The menu is expanded showing various subsections including Settings, Inventory, Taxes, Currency, and Attributes. \n\nBased on the user's goal to 'configure store settings, payment methods, and taxes', I should navigate to the Configuration section which would contain store settings and payment methods. I can see the 'Configuration' link under the 'Settings' category with ID [474].
